traits.name: Glide
entries: If it isn't {@condition incapacitated} or wearing heavy armor, the hadozee can extend its skin membranes to move up to 5 feet horizontally for every 1 foot it descends in the air.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The hadozee makes two Shortsword attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
entries: Ranged atk +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3 damage) piercing damage.
